reviews.review_msg: Although, yes Seager is nice, and can recall facts, his ability to convey his thoughts logically is seriously lacking!! I thought I was taking social hist, he taught political/econ. He was politically incorrect and offensive.  And he handed in the grades way past the due date! NEVER take him!!!

Completely impossible, would have failed the entire class if he could have. Easily the worst prof I have encountered. Expectations are unrealistic, assignments unclear, and tests long. He's arrogant beyond belief. VERY VERY frustrating experience. AVOID his highness at all costs.
